an8.87:1.1: “Atthahi, bhikkhave, angehi samannagatassa upasakassa akankhamano sangho pattam nikkujjeyya.
an8.87:1.3: Bhikkhunam alabhaya parisakkati, bhikkhunam anatthaya parisakkati, bhikkhunam avasaya parisakkati, bhikkhu akkosati paribhasati, bhikkhu bhikkhuhi bhedeti, buddhassa avannam bhasati, dhammassa avannam bhasati, sanghassa avannam bhasati.
an8.87:1.4: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, atthahangehi samannagatassa upasakassa akankhamano sangho pattam nikkujjeyya.
an8.87:2.1: Atthahi, bhikkhave, angehi samannagatassa upasakassa akankhamano sangho pattam ukkujjeyya.
an8.87:2.3: Na bhikkhunam alabhaya parisakkati, na bhikkhunam anatthaya parisakkati, na bhikkhunam avasaya parisakkati, na bhikkhu akkosati paribhasati, na bhikkhu bhikkhuhi bhedeti, buddhassa vannam bhasati, dhammassa vannam bhasati, sanghassa vannam bhasati.
an8.87:2.4: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, atthahangehi samannagatassa upasakassa akankhamano sangho pattam ukkujjeyya”ti.
